actionCalls.description: New lines are not preserved if we use the value of a long text area field and display it in a rich text field on screen. When we replace newline characters by HTML tags, we can display the text properly
actionCalls.name: Replace_New_Lines_in_Annotations
actionCalls.label: Replace New Lines in Annotations

assignments.description: Saves all current values to make sure that the input remains the same when going back to the screen
assignments.name: Save_Input_Values
assignments.label: Save Input Values

rules.name: All_good
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 9 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8
rules.label: All good

rules.name: HeyPaket_New_Start_Date_Active_End_Date
rules.label: [HeyPaket] New Start Date < Active End Date

Flow.description: RO-1271, RO-1272, RO-1425, RO-1458,RO-1528, RO-1485, RO-1548, Validations Refactoring, RO-1576, RO-1981, RO-2032, RO-2089, RO - 2166, Run the flow in system context without sharing - Access all data. RO-1999, RO-2419, Translating, RO-2561 , RO - 2794

formulas.name: formulaDisplayWinReasons
formulas.expression: AND ( {!Get_Opportunity.RecordType.Name} <> "Agency Customer Business", {!Get_Opportunity.RecordType.Name} <> "Agency Business", {!Get_Opportunity.RecordType.Name} <> "Agency Acquisition", {!Get_Opportunity.RecordType.Name} <> "Customer Self Service", {!Get_Opportunity.Onlinekauf__c} = False, {!$Profile.Id} != {!$Label.ProfileId_System_Admin}, {!$Profile.Id} !={!$Label.ProfileId_CusOps_Manager}, {!$Profile.Id} !={!$Label.ProfileId_Agency_Manager}, ISBLANK( TEXT( {!Get_Quote.Opportunity.Win_Reasons__c} ) ) )

fields.name: TitleInvoiceInfo

fields.name: HelpText1
fields.fieldText:
W채hle einen Invoice Kontakt und verwende dessen Kontaktdaten oder trage sie unten manuell ein.

Achtung: der Button "Use Contact Information" funktioniert nur, wenn du die Pflichtfelder oben ausgef체llt hast!

value.stringValue: Do you want to automatically create a new Opportunity?

fields.name: Amount_for_new_Opp
fields.fieldText: Amount for new Opp

fields.name: HelpText7
fields.fieldText:
Wenn diese Option ausgew채hlt ist, wird automatisch eine Account Management Opportunity erstellt, wenn diese Opportunity auf Closed Won wechselt.

Eine neue Opportunity wird nur dann erstellt, wenn der eingetragene Amount gr철er als 0 ist.
